message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be extremely valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specific details about the product at this time, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1000000 to me. I'm willing to let you have it for $1500000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident it will be a profitable investment for you. Let me know what you think.
